## Css.register() function

Add some CSS to the blob that will be injected later. Allows optional components such as fields and the toolbox to store separate CSS.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function register(cssContent: string | string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cssContent | string \| string\[\] | Multiline CSS string or an array of single lines of CSS.  Blockly.Css.register |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
